author: David Preston
title: Worst Bond Girl Name Puns
text:
Home » News » Entertainment » Worst Bond Girl Name Puns Worst Bond Girl Name Puns By David Preston | @davpresto October 23, 2015 1:43 pm WTOP counts down to ‘Spectre’ (Nov. 6) by ranking every Bond topic imaginable. Click here to reach the table of contents for all of our Bond rankings 
Introduction 
What is it with Ian Fleming and suggestive names? How did he think he could get “Pussy Galore” past the censors? And why did the producers take risque names to the next level? Honestly, “Christmas Jones?” Actually, make that taking outrageousness and squaring it. But then again, what is a Bond film without at least one woman’s name generating the necessary double entendre ? Of course, the key for these names is Bond hearing the lady introduce herself — and then double or triple-take. Here’s a list of five of the worst Bond Girl name puns (Note: the list does not include “Pussy Galore,” because we included her in our list of Best Bond Girls ).
